element.name: CAS.ProductId
element.description: A Product's unique identifier within the CAS namespace.

element.name: CAS.ProductName
element.description: A Product's name within the CAS namespace.

element.name: CAS.ProductReceivedTime
element.description: The ISO 8601 formatted time that the Product was received.

element.name: Filename
element.description: The names of the files that represent this product.

element.name: FileLocation
element.description: The locations of the files that represent this product.

element.name: ProtocolId
element.description: EDRN protocol identifiers associated with this product, i.e., pointers to associated EDRN protocols.

element.name: DatasetId
element.description: A pointer to the eCAS dataset (if any) that this product belongs to.

element.name: SiteId
element.description: Pointers to EDRN sites that provided data encapsulated within this product.

element.name: OrganId
element.description: Pointers to organs that this product contains data about.

element.name: SpecimenId
element.description: Pointers to any associated specimens in a freezer that this product data is associated with.
